alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 06 at 2:55AM MST until January 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. Wind Chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Sterling, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Winter Storm Warning will expire due to decreasing snow bands and snowfall rates. Light snow will continue through early morning Thursday.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
